column1: '''''mirubhōze''''' is a [[Valarin]] word, meaning "a honey wine".<ref name=PE17>{{PE
column2: 17}}, p. 38</ref> The form ''mirubhōzē-'' is said to be "the beginning of a longer word".<ref name=WJ>{{WJ

column1: It contains the element ''mirub''/''mirub-'' ("wine").<ref name=PE17/><ref name=WJ/>
